channel.title: Polyphonic controller using RAW samples?
channel.description: Hi First post here, been tying to make a polyphonic sample machine Everything works in mono, but poly doesn't seem to work here. It works if I replace the table with a saw or any other objects in the sub-patch. Do I need to add something to the table in the sub-patch maybe? See attached for patch I'm a total noob here, and help is most appreciated! polysampler1.axp (4.1 KB)

item.title: Polyphonic controller using RAW samples?
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

There is a mellotron patch in the community library (abhoth/AxoBlock/Mellotron) which is a polyphonic sample player. It's not perfect, but it works. It might give you an idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Polyphonic controller using RAW samples?
item.dc:creator: @quizz_kid
item.description:
@quizz_kid wrote:

Hi

First post here, been tying to make a polyphonic sample machine

Everything works in mono, but poly doesn't seem to work here.
It works if I replace the table with a saw or any other objects in the sub-patch.

Do I need to add something to the table in the sub-patch maybe? See attached for patch

I'm a total noob here, and help is most appreciated!

polysampler1.axp (4.1 KB)

Read full topic
